overviewDetailItems.label: Objective
overviewDetailItems.content: Develop A Digital Transformation Strategy Aligned With The Organization's Strategy And The Objectives Of Saudi Vision 2030.

children.text: Prepare A Digital Transformation Strategy For The Transition To Electronic Government Transactions, Including The Following:

items: The Organization's Vision, Mission, Strategic Pillars.

overviewDetailItems.label: Evidence Documents
overviewDetailItems.content: Submit The Approved Digital Transformation Strategy That Includes All Requirements Of This Standard.

overviewDetailItems.label: Related Regulations
overviewDetailItems.content: Council Of Ministers Resolution No. (40) Dated 27/2/1427H, Clause (16).

commentsData.author: Ahmed Khaled
commentsData.message: The digital transformation strategy looks comprehensive. We should focus on implementing the KPI framework first.

commentsData.author: Mona Hamed
commentsData.message: I agree. The timeline seems realistic. Let's schedule a meeting to discuss the implementation requirements.

commentsData.author: Sara Ali
commentsData.message: Great progress! The evidence documents are well organized. Looking forward to the next phase.

activitiesData.title: Evidence uploaded
activitiesData.description: Customer satisfaction survey evidence has been uploaded to the system

activitiesData.title: New audit report submitted
activitiesData.description: Financial perspective audit report has been completed and submitted
